lines.text:
[about his newspaper]
Is there any way we can be of service?
Probably, but you got too many clothes on.
I said you talk too much.
What's the matter? You need a written invitation?
Get down your Skivvies, honey, and I'll tell you my most intimate thoughts.
[Buxom Mona's massage from her maid turns to a breast massage and then to an oil assisted breast massage]
